member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO
member.summary: A buffer of metadata for the placeholder file or directory.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.FileBasicInfo
member.summary: A structure that supplies basic information about the item: the size of the file in bytes (should be zero if the IsDirectory field is set to TRUE), the item’s timestamps, and its attributes.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.EaInformation
member.summary: A structure that supplies extended attribute (EA) information about the item.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.EaInformation.EaBufferSize
member.summary: The size in bytes of the extended attribute buffer. If there is no extended attribute information, this must be set to 0.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.EaInformation.OffsetToFirstEa
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, from the start of the PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO structure to the first FILE_FULL_EA_INFORMATION entry.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.SecurityInformation
member.summary: Supplies custom security descriptor information about the item.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.SecurityInformation.SecurityBufferSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the custom security descriptor. If there is no custom security descriptor, this must be set to 0.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.SecurityInformation.OffsetToSecurityDescriptor
member.summary: Specifies the offset, in bytes, from the start of the PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO structure to the SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR structure.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.StreamsInformation
member.summary: Supplies information about alternate data streams for the item.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.StreamsInformation.StreamsInfoBufferSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of alternate data stream information for the placeholder. If there are no alternate data streams, this must be set to 0.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.StreamsInformation.OffsetToFirstStreamInfo
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, from the start of the PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO structure to the first FILE_STREAM_INFORMATION entry.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.VariableData
member.summary: Start of the variable-length buffer to hold EAs, a custom security descriptor, and alternate data stream information.

member.name: PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_INFO.versionInfo
member.summary: Version information for the placeholder (see for more information on PRJ_PLACEHOLDER_VERSION_INFO).
